plot: Have you ever gave thought about where your nice juicy burger comes from? Human Meat Factory takes us into real human meat slaughterhouses, and discover the disturbingly shocking truth about the burger we eat everyday.
title: Human Meat Factory
plot_es: Have you ever gave thought about where your nice juicy burger comes from? Human Meat Factory takes us into real human meat slaughterhouses, and discover the disturbingly shocking truth about the burger we eat everyday.
plot_en: Have you ever gave thought about where your nice juicy burger comes from? Human Meat Factory takes us into real human meat slaughterhouses, and discover the disturbingly shocking truth about the burger we eat everyday.
